Method Detail

newInstance

public static LanguageFactory newInstance()
Returns a new LanguageFactory instance.

Returns:
a newly allocated LanguageFactory.

getAvailableLanguages

public Language[] getAvailableLanguages()
Returns the available languages for this LanguageFactory as array of Language objects.

Returns:
an array with all available Languages.

getLanguageByFile

public Language getLanguageByFile(File file)
                           throws NoSuchLanguageException
Returns the Language for the specified file. I.e. if the file is "sample.l0" the language L0 will be returned.

Parameters:
file - the file for which to return the Language.
Returns:
the language for the given fileName.
Throws:
NoSuchLanguageException - if the file is not recognized.
NullPointerException - if file is null.

getLanguageById

public Language getLanguageById(String id)
                         throws NoSuchLanguageException
Returns the Language with the specified id.

Parameters:
id - the unique identifier of the Language to return, for example "l1".
Returns:
the language with the specified id.
Throws:
NoSuchLanguageException - if the id does not refer to a valid language.
NullPointerException - if id is null.
